import React from 'react'; import './Post.css'; import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUpAlt'; import FavoriteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Favorite'; import {Users} from '../../Data'; function Post({post}) { return (
user.id === post.userId).userName} className="postProfileImage"/> {Users.filter((user)=> user.id === post.userId).userName} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
